description.english: Play through the first four Chapters.
description.german: Beende die ersten vier Kapitel.
description.french: Jouez les chapitres 1 à 4.
description.spanish: Juega los capítulos del 1 al 4.
description.italian: Gioca i capitoli dall'1 al 4.
description.russian: Пройдите уровни 1-4.
description.japanese: 最初の4つの章を終える。

description.english: Play through Chapter 5 to 8.
description.german: Beende Kapitel 5 bis 8.
description.french: Jouez les chapitres 5 à 8.
description.spanish: Juega los capítulos del 5 al 8.
description.italian: Gioca i capitoli dal 5 all'8.
description.russian: Пройдите уровни 5-8.
description.japanese: 第5章から第8章までを終える。

description.english: Play through Chapter 9 to 11.

description.italian: Gioca i capitoli dal 9 all'11.

description.japanese: 第9章から第11章までを終える。

description.english: Play through Chapter 12 and 13.
description.german: Beende Kapitel 12 und 13.
description.french: Jouez les chapitres 12 et 13.
description.spanish: Juega los capítulos del 12 al 13.
description.italian: Gioca i capitoli 12 e 13.
description.russian: Пройдите уровни 12-13.
description.japanese: 第12章と第13章を終える。
description.schinese: 完成第12-13章

displayName.german: Experte im Gebiet der Seltsamen Götter
displayName.spanish: Experto en el mundo de los dioses extraños
displayName.japanese: 風変りな神世界の練達者

description.english: Play through Chapter 14 and 15.
description.german: Beende Kapitel 14 und 15.
description.french: Jouez les chapitres 14 et 15.
description.spanish: Juega los capítulos del 14 al 15.
description.italian: Gioca i capitoli 14 e 15.
description.russian: Пройдите уровни 14-15.
description.japanese: 第14章と第15章を終える。

description.english: Play through the tutorial mission.
description.german: Beende die Tutorial-Mission.
description.french: Accomplir la mission du tutoriel.
description.spanish: Supera la misión tutorial.
description.italian: Gioca la missione del tutorial.
description.russian: Пройдите показательную миссию.
description.japanese: チュートリアルを終える。

description.english: Complete TRI.
description.german: Beende das komplette Spiel.
description.french: Terminez TRI.
description.spanish: Completa TRI.
description.italian: Completa TRI.
description.russian: Пройдите TRI.
description.japanese: TRIをクリアする。
description.schinese: 通关《TRI》

description.english: Create 1,000 triangles.
description.german: Erschaffe 1000 Dreiecke.
description.french: Créer 1 000 triangles.
description.spanish: Crea 1.000 triángulos.
description.italian: Crea 1.000 triangoli.
description.russian: Создайте 1000 треугольников.
description.japanese: 1,000個のトライアングルを形成。
description.schinese: 生成1000个三角

description.english: Find all hidden idols in one level.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Idole in einem Level.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les idoles cachées d'un niveau.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los ídolos escondidos de un nivel.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli idoli nascosti in un livello.
description.russian: Найдите всех идолов на одном уровне.
description.japanese: あるステージで隠された彫像をすべて発見する。
description.schinese: 找到1个关卡中所有的偶像

description.english: Find all hidden idols in three levels.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Idole in drei Levels.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les idoles cachées de trois niveaux.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los ídolos escondidos de tres niveles.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli idoli nascosti in tre livelli.
description.russian: Найдите всех идолов на трех уровнях.
description.japanese: 3つのステージで隠された彫像をすべて発見する。
description.schinese: 找到3个关卡中所有的偶像

description.english: Find all hidden idols in seven levels.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Idole in sieben Levels.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les idoles cachées de sept niveaux.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los ídolos escondidos de siete niveles.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli idoli nascosti in sette livelli.
description.russian: Найдите всех идолов на семи уровнях.
description.japanese: 7つのステージで隠された彫像をすべて発見する。
description.schinese: 找到7个关卡中所有的偶像

description.english: Find all hidden idols in 14 levels.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Idole in 14 Levels.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les idoles cachées de 14 niveaux.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los ídolos escondidos de 14 niveles.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli idoli nascosti in 14 livelli.
description.russian: Найдите всех идолов на 14 уровнях.
description.japanese: 14のステージで隠された彫像をすべて発見する。
description.schinese: 找到14个关卡中所有的偶像

description.english: Laser yourself to death ten times.
description.german: Laser dich zehn Mal zu Tode.
description.french: Utilisez le laser pour vous tuer à dix reprises.
description.spanish: Mátate a ti mismo con el láser diez veces.
description.italian: Usa il laser mortale su te stesso per dieci volte.
description.russian: Смертельно поразите себя лазером десять раз.
description.japanese: レーザーで10回死ぬ。
description.schinese: 被激光照死10回

description.english: Fall into deadly acid pits ten times.
description.german: Stirb zehn mal in Säurebädern.
description.french: Tombez à dix reprises dans des fosses mortelles d'acide.
description.spanish: Cae en los mortales fosos de ácido diez veces.
description.italian: Cadi nelle fosse piene di acido letale per dieci volte.
description.russian: Упасть в кислотное забвение десять раз.
description.japanese: 死の酸に10回溺れる。
description.schinese: 落入致死的酸液池10回

description.english: Reflected one single light ray 50 times.
description.german: Reflektiere einen einzelnen Lichtstrahl 50 Mal.
description.french: Faites réfléchir un seul rayon de lumière à 50 reprises.
description.spanish: Refleja un solo rayo de luz 50 veces.
description.italian: Rifletti un singolo raggio di luce per 50 volte.
description.russian: Отразить луч света 50 раз.
description.japanese: ひとつの光線を50回反射させる。
description.schinese: 将一道光反射50次

displayName.french: Oups, vous avez oublié quelque chose...
displayName.spanish: Vaya, parece que te has olvidado algo...
displayName.japanese: おっと、何か忘れてるぞ

description.english: Beat "Overcoming Limitations" without collecting the TRI artifact.
description.german: Beende "Überwundene Grenzen" ohne das TRI eingesammelt zu haben.
description.french: Terminez "Dépasser les limites" sans récupérer l'artefact TRI.
description.spanish: Supera "Superación de límites" sin conseguir el artefacto TRI.
description.italian: Batti il livello "Superamento dei limiti" senza raccogliere il manufatto TRI.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень "За пределами возможного" без артефактов TRI.
description.japanese: TRIの神器をとらずに"定めに克つ"をクリアする。
description.schinese: 不收集神器TRI即打通「突破限制」

description.english: Create the biggest triangle possible.
description.german: Erschaffe das größtmögliche Dreieck.
description.french: Créez le plus grand triangle possible.
description.spanish: Crea el triángulo más grande posible.
description.italian: Crea il triangolo più grande possibile.
description.russian: Создайте самый большой треугольник.
description.japanese: できうる最大のトライアングルを形成する。
description.schinese: 生成可能范围内最大的三角

displayName.french: J'y suis retourné pour jeter un œil
displayName.spanish: He vuelto y he mirado otra vez
displayName.italian: Sei tornato e hai dato un'altra occhiata

displayName.english: In the Darkness No One Hears You Walking on Walls
displayName.german: In der Dunkelheit Hört Dich Niemand Auf den Wänden Laufen
displayName.french: Dans le noir, personne ne sait que je marche sur les murs
displayName.spanish: En la Oscuridad, nadie te oye caminar por los muros
displayName.italian: Nell'oscurità, nessuno ti sente camminare sulle pareti
displayName.russian: В темноте никто не услышит вас идущим по стене
displayName.japanese: 暗闇ではだれも壁を歩く音を聞かない
displayName.schinese: 黑暗中没人听得见你在墙上行走
